title: More Skilled Construction Workers Are The Key To Solving America’s Housing Crisis
description: Rather than rent control and subsidies, there’s a real solution: addressing the critical shortage of skilled workers in construction.
content: America is grappling with a housing affordability crisis. While many on the left advocate for increased government involvement, such as rent control and subsidies, Ed Brady, the CEO of the Home Build… [+6426 chars]
